newsitem.title: USA: Calgon to buy Florida company for $70 mln. [CORRECTED 17:50 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Calgon to buy Florida company for $70 mln. [CORRECTED 17:50 GMT]

text.p: Calgon Carbon Corp said Tuesday that it has agreed to acquire Advanced Separation Technologies Inc from Florida Progress Corp and Potomac Capital Investment Corp (Calgon corrects from Potomac Electric Power Co) for $70 million cash.
Advanced Separation Technologies of Lakeland, Florida, designs and makes separation process systems for the lysine and corn syrup industries.
The company has about $30 million in annual sales, Calgon said.
The deal should be completed by December 31, Calgon said.
